page.title: 01South and West Wakefield
page.content: The area lies to the South and West of Wakefield and includes part of the former City area and part of what was the West Riding. The area is mixed and diverse, ranging from farm land through suburban developments to industrial areas both established and recent and on to open heath land. The features and areas to be found in {D block 04320417}are the City Park,the River Calder, Comprehensive, Middle and First Schools, railways, the Calder & Hebble,and Barnsley (disused) canals, man made lakes, Sandal Castle (motte and bailey), diverse housing, a maternity hospital, power station, Wakefield Trinity R.L.F.C.,gypsy camp, common land, two villages, a disused mine and the City cemetery.
